posts.post_content:
Nobody's compared it to [Goblin Chieftain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Chieftain) yet?  
  
I prefer the new guy, but the cost reduction is probably more valuable than the power/toughness boost for some people. The haste is what's really important anyways.  
  
And it makes more sense to me if it's a [ruby medallion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=ruby medallion) around his neck, rather than a Mox.
